001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperty.Property;
006
007/**
008 * Builder to create {@link io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory }.
009 * <table class="table">
010 * <caption><strong>Properties retrieved from LogProperties</strong></caption>
011 * <tr>
012 * <th>Property Pattern</th>
013 * <th>Type</th>
014 * <th>Required</th>
015 * <th>Default</th>
016 * <th>Description</th>
017 * </tr>
018 * <tr>
019 * <td><code>{@value PROPERTY_bufferSize }</code></td>
020 * <td><code>Integer</code></td>
021 * <td><code>true</code></td>
022 * <td>{@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor.DisruptorConfigurator#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }</td>
023 * <td></td>
024 * </tr>
025 * </table>
026 */
027public final class DisruptorLogBuilder implements io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogBuilder<DisruptorLogBuilder,io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory> {
028
029        /**
030         * The properties to be retrieved from config will have
031         * this prefix.
032         */
033        static final String PROPERTY_PREFIX = "logging.publisher.{name}.";
034        
035        /**
036         * <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> 
037         */
038        static final String PROPERTY_bufferSize = PROPERTY_PREFIX + "bufferSize";
039        
040        private final String propertyPrefix;
041        final Property<java.lang.Integer> property_bufferSize;
042        
043        private final java.lang.String name;
044        private java.lang.Integer bufferSize = io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor.DisruptorConfigurator.DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE;
045        
046        /**
047         * Create a builder for {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory }.
048         * @param name will fill <code>{name}</code> in <code>logging.publisher.{name}.</code>. 
049         */
050        public DisruptorLogBuilder(
051                        java.lang.String name
052                        ) {
053                java.util.Map<String,String> prefixParameters = java.util.Map.of(
054                                "name", name
055                        );
056                this.propertyPrefix = LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_PREFIX, prefixParameters);
057                this.name = name;
058                property_bufferSize = Property.builder()
059                        .ofInt()
060                        .build(LogProperties.interpolateKey(PROPERTY_bufferSize, prefixParameters));
061
062        }
063
064
065        
066        /**
067         * Sets <strong>required</strong> bufferSize.
068         * 
069         * Default is {@value io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor.DisruptorConfigurator#DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE }.
070         * @param bufferSize <code>{@value #PROPERTY_bufferSize } = java.lang.Integer</code> 
071         * @return this builder.
072         */
073        public DisruptorLogBuilder bufferSize(java.lang.Integer bufferSize) {
074                this.bufferSize = bufferSize;
075                return this;
076        }
077        
078        /**
079         * Creates {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory } from this builder.
080         * @return {@code io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory }.
081         */
082        public io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogPublisher.PublisherFactory build() {
083                return io.jstach.rainbowgum.disruptor.DisruptorConfigurator.of(
084                                this.name
085                                , property_bufferSize.require(this.bufferSize)
086                                );
087        }
088        
089        @Override
090        public DisruptorLogBuilder fromProperties(LogProperties properties) {
091                var __v = LogProperty.Validator.of(this.getClass());
092                var _bufferSize = property_bufferSize.get(properties).or(this.bufferSize);
093                __v.add(_bufferSize);
094                __v.validate();
095                this.bufferSize = _bufferSize.value();
096                return this;
097        }
098        
099        /**
100         * Turns the builder into java.util.Properties like Map skipping values that are null.
101         * @param consumer apply is called where first arg is key and second is value.
102         */
103        public void toProperties(java.util.function.BiConsumer<String, String> consumer) {
104                var _bufferSize = this.bufferSize;
105                if (_bufferSize != null) {
106                        consumer.accept(property_bufferSize.key(), property_bufferSize.propertyString(_bufferSize));
107                }
108        }
109        
110        /**
111         * The interpolated property prefix: {@value #PROPERTY_PREFIX}.
112         * @return resolved prefix which should end with a "<code>.</code>".
113         */
114        @Override
115        public String propertyPrefix() {
116                return this.propertyPrefix;
117        }
118        
119}
